# Data viz
 
 - We are going to use ggplot
 - ggplot works with data frames
 - We add layers

## Histogram
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(palmerpenguins)

ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm),data = penguins) + geom_histogram()

```

## Kernel Density Estimators
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(palmerpenguins)

ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm),data = penguins) + geom_density()

```

## Boxplot 

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm),data = penguins) + geom_boxplot()
```

## Barplot 

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = species),data = penguins) + geom_bar()
```

## Barplot 

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = species, color = species),data = penguins) + geom_bar()
```

## Barplot 

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = species, fill = species),data = penguins) + geom_bar()
```

## Side-by-side boxplots
```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = species, y = bill_length_mm),data = penguins) + geom_boxplot()
```

## Scatterplot 

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm),data = penguins) + geom_point()
```

## Scatterplot 

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm),data = penguins) + geom_point(color = "salmon")
```

## Scatterplot 

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color = species),data = penguins) + geom_point()
```

## Scatterplot 

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color = species),data = penguins) + geom_point() + geom_smooth()
```

## Faceting

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm),data = penguins) + geom_point() + geom_smooth() + facet_grid(~species)
```

## Faceting

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, color = island),data = penguins) + geom_point() + geom_smooth() + facet_grid(~species)
```

## Faceting

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm),data = penguins) + geom_point() + geom_smooth() + facet_grid(species~1)
```

## Faceting

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm),data = penguins) + geom_point() + geom_smooth() + facet_grid(species~island)
```
